input_text:
Job Title: Founding Engineer

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
About Garden

Garden (gardenintel.com) accelerates global technological development by fixing the patent system. We're building AI-powered search and analysis tools to make the patent process less painful and more effective for R&D organizations, inventors, prosecutors, and litigators. Our core product, Patentbreaker, is a groundbreaking 102/103 prior art search tool that automates the generation of claims charts for inter-partes reviews.

Leading companies and law firms are already seeing huge efficiency gains from our beta tools, and we were able to monetize a couple weeks into deploying. But this is just the beginning - our vision is to leverage AI, rich data, and scalable analysis to drive smarter R&D investment decisions across industries. The patent system today is overwhelmed by the explosion of filings, fragmented across service providers, and inaccessible to many inventors. We're here to change that. Our early traction has been incredible, with hundreds of users, a growing enterprise waitlist, and key advisors bought into our mission. Recently, we raised a seed round from top Silicon Valley VCs and angel investors.

We're a tight-knit, ambitious team of experts in NLP, patents, and product development. Weâ€™re incredibly customer obsessed, work in the office 5-6 days a week, and ship on tight timelines. We are a mix of research and product in our work, and seek to find members of our team that are excited by both in a burgeoning industry.

The opportunity is huge, the problem is urgent, and the team is top-notch. If you're an exceptional full-stack/backend engineer who wants a high-impact role at a fast-moving AI startup, we'd love to chat. At Garden, you won't just grow as an engineer - you'll help plant the seeds for a better innovation ecosystem.

About The Role

As a founding engineer, you will work on building multiple new software products from the ground up, as well as make core improvements to existing products. You will also be involved in helping to build out our engineering team. This will require curiosity for the space Garden operates in, an entrepreneurial mindset, broad and deep technical knowledge, a willingness to iterate rapidly, the ability to make difficult trade-offs, and ultimately, the desire to be held accountable for Garden products as experienced by users.

Responsibilities

Architect software products and features that provide value to usersImplement, maintain, and improve software products and featuresScope and lead technical projectsWrite technical documentationContribute to recruiting effortsIn-person, NYC

Qualifications

Ability and enthusiasm to build top quality software products in a highly demanding and fast-paced environment. Experience with the full stack of cloud-based software developmentExperience with Typescript, React, and NodeJsExperience configuring scalable and secure infrastructureA strong understanding of the speed/quality trade-off and an ability to strike the right balance based on user and business needsEnthusiasm to own problems end-to-end, and learn what needs to be learned to get the job done

Nice to Have

Experience with UX/UI designExperience with dedicated backend languages like Golang or RustFormal degrees or other certifications relevant to the position

Compensation

The expected total cash compensation for this role is $200,000 - $300,000 with additional equity and benefits.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Founding Engineer
output_json.summary: Garden is building AI-powered search and analysis tools to fix the patent system.
job_responsibilities: Architect software products and features that provide value to users
Implement, maintain, and improve software products and features
output_json.company_information: Garden is a startup aiming to accelerate global technological development by improving the patent system.
